WITH RECURSIVE get_wiki_title_tree AS (SELECT wiki_no, title, parent_wiki_no, ordr, 1 AS LEVEL FROM wiki WHERE parent_wiki_no IS NULL AND study_no = #{studyNo}
UNION ALL
SELECT w.wiki_no, w.title, w.parent_wiki_no, w.ordr, c.LEVEL + 1 FROM get_wiki_title_tree c INNER JOIN wiki w ON w.parent_wiki_no = c.wiki_no)
SELECT wiki_no, parent_wiki_no, title, ordr FROM get_wiki_title_tree
